Name: Puzzle Light: Rotate
About the game: Puzzle Light: Rotate is a Logic Game. The goal in each level is to rotate the pieces to form the circuit and turn on the lights. 50 hand-crafted levels; A fun puzzle game (even for those who have no knowledge of electronic circuits); At some levels, it is possible to assemble the circuit in more than one way; If you make a short circuit on battery, it will explode. (Be careful).
